docs.text:
Whitepaper: Ping Attention Marketplace


A decentralized personal attention marketplace on the Ethereum blockchain.



Where to start?




Introducing Decentralized Attention Marketplace
 describes attention markets, its current problems, and our proposed solution.


Ping Protocol
 provides an overview and design of the platform for a decentralized attention marketplace.


Token Mechanism
 outlines the Ping token model and its utilities.


Business Model
 describes our business plan, competitive analysis, and various use cases.


Current Progress and Future Roadmap
 lists our completed, ongoing, and future milestones.


Meet the Team
 presents our team, advisors, and supporters.




About this document


We are regularly updating this document as our project matures and evolves. Feedback is very much appreciated.


See the issues for topics that need to be covered or updated. If you have an idea you would like to discuss, please chat with us in 
Gitter
.


If you've written an article or blog post, please contact us at 
info@pingtoken.com
.
